title: Heading to re:Invent and have questions or interest in learning more about AWS Graviton? if so be su
text:
Heading to re:Invent and have questions or interest in learning more about AWS Graviton? if so be sure to join Paul Reilly and I in our chalk talk on Thursday 12/4 at 11am see: https://s12d.com/CMP329
  
Can't make the chalk talk? then check out this meetup opportunity - "MUP225: Everything you wanted to know about AWS Graviton but were afraid to ask" on Monday 12/1 at 1pm see: https://s12d.com/MUP225
  
And if neither of those work then just reach out and we'll figure out how to connect while at re:Invent :-)

#AWS #Graviton #AWSreInvent #CMP329 #MUP225

title: A great take from Werner. The role of the developer is evolving fast, and AI is giving builders more
text:
A great take from Werner. The role of the developer is evolving fast, and AI is giving builders more leverage than ever. 

Excited to hear more next week at re:Invent. These predictions are essential reading before Las Vegas.

title: Last reminder for Andy Brown and mines session "COP401 | Advanced analytics with AWS Cost and Usage
text:
Last reminder for Andy Brown and mines session "COP401 | Advanced analytics with AWS Cost and Usage Reports" at #AWSreInvent

https://lnkd.in/eYaJphj2

Join this engaging code talk to dive deep into advanced analytics techniques using #AWSCostAndUsageReports. You'll discover how to transform raw cost data into actionable insights, optimize your cloud spending, and build sophisticated reporting solutions. Learn to leverage powerful analytics tools to uncover hidden cost patterns, create custom dashboards, and implement automated cost monitoring workflows. This session will equip you with practical skills to maximize your cloud investment and drive financial efficiency across your organization. 💡

#AWS #DataAnalytics #CloudFinancialManagement #AWSreInvent

title: 🎤 I’m excited to be speaking at "The Future of FinOps: Intelligent Automation in the Age of Scale” h
text:
🎤 I’m excited to be speaking at "The Future of FinOps: Intelligent Automation in the Age of Scale” happening during AWS re:Invent:

🗓️ Monday, December 1 | 🕖 7:00 PM PST
📍 Private Suite- Las Vegas (location shared upon confirmation)

Hosted by Wiv.ai, in partnership with CloudHealth, Xebia, CyberArk, and Amazon Web Services (AWS), this invite-only panel will bring together FinOps and platform leaders to discuss how automation, observability, and smart workflows are reshaping cloud efficiency at scale.

I’ll be joining an amazing lineup:
✨ Mudit Gupta (Xebia)
✨ Lucas Paratore (CloudHealth)
✨ Uri Eliyahu (CyberArk)
✨ Roni ‏Karp (Wiv.ai)

If you’re heading to re:Invent and want to start your week with good food, great people, and real talk about the future of FinOps, request your seat below.

👉 https://lnkd.in/dknt7x59

title: #AWSreInvent promises to be an exciting week with keynotes, breakouts, demos, workshops, and more. I
text:
#AWSreInvent promises to be an exciting week with keynotes, breakouts, demos, workshops, and more. I'm excited to present the #CloudOperations Innovation Talk "Ops in the AI age: Innovating together for faster, more efficient operations" with Jeff Barr, Vice President and Chief Evangelist at Amazon Web Services (AWS), where we'll cover all things generative and agentic AI. From the expansive Expo to intimate one-on-one engagements, there are plenty of opportunities to connect with AWS teams, partners, and customers. See you at re:Invent 2025 in Las Vegas from December 1 to 5!
#GenerativeAI #Innovation #DigitalTransformation #TechLeadership #CloudComputing

title: I’m excited to share that I’ll be on the ground in Las Vegas for #AWSreinvent 2025, and this year is
text:
I’m excited to share that I’ll be on the ground in Las Vegas for #AWSreinvent 2025, and this year is a big one for Temporal Technologies.

If you’re interested in the intersection of GenAI, durable execution, and resilience, come find us. We're running a packed lineup of sessions all week, including:

🔹 Better Together: Building Resilient Agents at Scale with AgentCore + Temporal
Tue, Dec 2 | 1:00–2:30 PM PT | HaSalon, Palazzo 

🔹 Building Reliable Systems with EKS, Grafana Labs, and Temporal
Thu, Dec 4 | 1:00–2:30 PM PT | HaSalon, Palazzo 

🔹 Deploying Enterprise Agents: Resilient and Built for the Real World
Tue, Dec 2 | 3:25–3:55 PM | Developer Pavilion, Expo Floor

🔹Building Reliable AI Systems: Temporal Workflows with Strands Agents on AWS
Wed, Dec 3 | 12:40–1:10 PM | Developer Pavilion, Expo Floor

🔹 Durable Execution w/ New Relic (New Relic Booth #247)
Wed, Dec 3 | 3:30–3:45 PM

Whether you’re building AI agents, re-architecting critical workflows, or scaling cloud-native systems, swing by Booth #1382 or the HaSalon to see how Temporal is becoming a force multiplier for AWS customers.

Sing up for a session or book a meeting with me or anyone at Temporal through our Platinum sponsorship at the AWS Open Source Hangout in the Hasalon. Link in the description.


#generativeAI #AWS #AgenticAI #opensource #AWSreinvent

title: We’re just days away from re:Invent 2025, and one of the things I’m looking forward to the most is w
text:
We’re just days away from re:Invent 2025, and one of the things I’m looking forward to the most is welcoming Acquired to the event this year. 

I’ve been a long-time listener, and I’m excited to join Ben Gilbert and David Rosenthal on stage to talk about what it takes to build enduring companies, especially in this new era of AI. 

We’ll dig into lessons from leaders at Netflix, JPMorgan, and Perplexity—teams that are shaping how AI and cloud will evolve in the years ahead. 

I look forward to seeing you there. https://lnkd.in/g42JuJuS

title: Today, I built a meta-agent that spawns specialized sub-agents.  Each agent is created with their ow
text:
Today, I built a meta-agent that spawns specialized sub-agents.  Each agent is created with their own system prompts, context, tools, and model. This is a powerful way to have an agent offload tasks to save on context while staying focused on a defined goal or series of tasks.

In this example I asked an agent to "get the latest news from last Friday": 

1. First, the agent got the current date and time to understand when "last Friday" was
2. Then it fetched the latest AWS news
3. From there it filtered for news relevant to Strands, AgentCore, MCP, and Agents
4. After that the agent used the use_agent tool to have sub-agents review the content
5. It also had the agents extract links to code samples and documentation
6. Finally the agent provided a structured response

I'll be demoing this live before re:Invent. More details coming soon.

#AIAgents #StrandsAgents #AWS

title: It’s not every day you’re invited to join an AWS VP on stage for an Innovation Talk - huge thanks to
text:
It’s not every day you’re invited to join an AWS VP on stage for an Innovation Talk - huge thanks to Deepak Singh for having me part of his session alongside Brittany Doncaster from Delta Air Lines. Truly an honor!

Innovation Talks are where AWS VPs share the "why" behind the technology we’re all building with. Deepak leads the team at AWS building developer experiences powered by generative AI including Kiro, and in this talk, we’ll explore how AI agents are transforming the entire development lifecycle, from prototype to production.

I’ll be sharing some hands-on coding demos with to show what this future looks like in practice. Brittany will bring her perspective as Chief Architect at Delta, and Deepak will walk us through how AWS is designing accessible, secure AI tools that keep developers in control, and his future visions for this space.

It’s not often you get to demo for a room full of builders while standing next to the VP who’s shaping the future of developer tools at AWS. Grateful for the trust, the team, and the chance to make complex ideas feel tangible!

Catch it on Thursday December 4th, 11:00 AM PST in Palazzo Ballroom B.  
RSVP 🔗 https://bit.ly/inv205

👩🏻‍💻 Follow me (Brooke Jamieson) to stay in the loop with the latest AWS + AI updates for developers

📍 save + share!

🏷️ Amazon Web Services (AWS)
#AWS #reInvent2025 #AIAgents #Kiro #DeveloperExperience #DevTools
